character.name: Rimuru Tempest
character.desc: The main protagonist who was reincarnated as a slime and eventually becomes one of the strongest beings in the world.

character.name: Shizu
character.desc: A legendary Conqueror of Flames and the first person Rimuru ever promised to fulfill a wish for.

character.name: Ciel
character.desc: The ultimate skill and true consciousness that evolved from Raphael. Rimuru's most trusted partner and the core of his power.

character.name: Gobta
character.desc: A goblin who evolved into a hobgoblin. Surprisingly brave (and lucky) in combat despite his goofy personality.

character.name: Rigurd
character.desc: The wise and respected elder of the goblin village who becomes Minister of Internal Affairs in Tempest.

character.name: Rigur
character.desc: Captain of Tempest's security forces and Rigurd's son. Extremely loyal to Rimuru.

character.name: Ranga
character.desc: Rimuru's loyal direwolf companion who evolved into a majestic Tempest Star Wolf.

character.name: Benimaru
character.desc: Commander-in-Chief of Tempest's army. Calm, powerful, and one of Rimuru's most trusted generals.

character.name: Shuna
character.desc: Benimaru's gentle and intelligent younger sister. Princess of the Kijin and master of holy magic and research.

character.name: Shion
character.desc: Rimuru's self-proclaimed secretary and bodyguard. Incredibly strong and fiercely loyal (and a terrible cook).

character.name: Souei
character.desc: Master of stealth and reconnaissance. Leads Tempest's intelligence and shadow squad.

character.name: Hakuro
character.desc: Legendary swordmaster and instructor of Tempest's military forces.

character.name: Kurobe
character.desc: Tempest's master blacksmith who crafts legendary weapons and equipment.

character.name: Gabiru
character.desc: Proud and dramatic captain of the dragonewt Hiryuu aerial forces.

character.name: Veldora
character.desc: The Storm Dragon and Rimuru's first friend. Sealed for 300 years until freed by Rimuru.

character.name: Milim Nava
character.desc: The Destroyer — one of the oldest and strongest Demon Lords with a childlike personality.

character.name: Ramiris
character.desc: The Fairy Queen and ruler of the Labyrinth. Ancient Demon Lord of tiny stature but immense knowledge.

character.name: Hinata Sakaguchi
character.desc: Captain of the Holy Knights and leader of the Western Holy Church's Ten Great Saints. A former Japanese otherworlder.

character.name: Treyni
character.desc: Guardian of the Jura Forest who entrusted its protection to Rimuru.

character.name: Albis
character.desc: Captain of Eurazania's Three Beastketeers, known as Golden Snake Horn.

character.name: Vesta
character.desc: Former minister of Dwargon, now Minister of Science and Research in Tempest.

character.name: Clayman
character.desc: The Marionette Master — cunning and manipulative antagonist.

character.name: Geld
character.desc: King of the orcs, now Minister of Construction and one of Tempest's strongest defenders.

character.name: Diablo
character.desc: The primordial demon Noir. Rimuru's devoted butler and leader of the Black Numbers.
